column2: RN1 RN2 RN3 RN4 RN5 RN6

column9: U1 should be populated with two 20 pin headers to let the user plug in a "Raspberry Pi Pico" module

column1: Note:  The BOM does not list the Raspberry Pi Pico module required to plug into the female header pins of U1.  The user is assumed to supply their own module.
